  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.cluster.AtomixClusterBuilder

    public class AtomixClusterBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<AtomixCluster>
    Atomix cluster builder.

      • build

        public AtomixCluster build()
        Description copied from interface: Builder
        Builds the object.

        The returned object may be a new instance of the built class or a recycled instance, depending on the semantics of the builder implementation. Users should never assume that a builder allocates a new instance.

        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<AtomixCluster>
        Returns:
        The built object.
